Blog.post: Haven't been writing for the past 2 days..

Yawns. Maths lesson.. So boring.. Teacher can't be bother to teach.. WTF? ^^ The stupid botak teacher never come, life science even more boring. Then.. Went to play soccer near Darren's block.. Tartu la~ Then back home.. Why is everyday a boring day?
Today got the life science thingy, uhmm.. quite intresting, the teacher very fun. ^^ Went watch move with richmond, King Arthur, okok lar~ Abit hard to understand..

Day spoilt by Seng. Yes, the truth hurts, but i choose not to belive. Oh well, I guess it's really time for me to quit that life-leeching game. Blocked ALL the contacts under "Tibia Buddy" in my msn. :/

Boring day.. Today in class.. Last period listen MP3.. Then got a guy teacher.. At the back of the class, saw me listening MP3, Then i quickly act guai do work.. Then he close one eye.. Lalala~ Then come back home.. Kill guards on Elven Avatar like like 3-4 hours.. Received a sms from brother Noh that says "Establish the daily prayers and seek aid in the living One who does not die. Be among those who belive." Very meaningful to me.. Haha.. The girl not mad at me liao.. Phew~ So happy ^.^ I go kissed Marlanee in game, Gods made at me, chase with me after sd, missclick a noob, then red skulled.. So guilty now :X Feel so sleepy~ baba

Lalala.. Time now is 9.40pm.. So boring.. Trainining with Mystic Avatar/Seng.. Went to sell scale armor with him.. Made 77k.. Today in school... Lame DNT.. Need to saw the thick/strong metal.. Saw so long, haven't come out yet.. Keep taking break.. Sit here, sit there :X Can sleep sia.. So tired.. Then after school.. Relek only.. On the way to friend's house.. Crazy girls keep shouting nonsense.. Die lar~ I think the gal really mad with me.. What to do? :X Well.. Found the original "My Girl Lollipop" In kazaa.. Tommorrow I pia Elven.. St8 after school.. Pia guards like siao..

Sigh.. Saw her in the canteen.. Don't dare talk to her.. Because i made her mad(i think) yesterday.. The time now is 1.47 pm.. Just came back from school.. Went on Elven Avatar, wanted to go mines, need firefield, never check VIP list to see if Mystic Avatar is on9.. Kicked him.. In behemoth.. Luckily no behemoth at that moment.. Panxor and Grim Avatar was there..
Sounds like a lot of hoopla.. Uhmm.. Created this blogspot today... Also don't know what to do with this.. Maybe I'll treat this as my dairy.. I'll countine tomorrow.. :)
